name: Union Pants Red
description:
Carrying Capacity: 0.5K µSCU
987 delivers comfort, durability, and style with the Union pants. Designed with a special, next-gen blend of high-performance synthetic fabrics, these pants are enduringly fashionable in these modern times.
description_cn:
储物空间：0.5K μSCU
987为你带来舒适、耐用而时尚的联盟工装裤。这条裤子采用了特殊的次时代高强度人工合成面料，能够给予你在现代社会中最耐用的时尚和最时尚的耐用。
